item.title: Couple Of Question Please Answer :)
item.dc:creator: @kingofnone kingofnone
item.description:
@kingofnone wrote:

[quote=“Epic Ancient, post:18, topic:297578”][quote author=dylanmate link=topic=393973.msg2929082#msg2929082 date=1251162346]
okay thanks trying it now
thankyou for your helpp (:
your a star

and jeddac tbh i dont care what you say?
haa its losers like you that ruins the economy
yes he did spoonfeed me it but who cares?
isnt this what the forums are for?
there not guun add a fucking help section and no get any replies as it spoonfeeding
you fucking idiot

again thanks kingofnone
[/quote]

Economy? You mean community*?
Economy = the $£¥ related community.

Spoonfeeding isn’t really against the rules, but it is stated that we’re not a spoonfeeding community in the main forum rules.

Spoonfeeding = Telling someone to “add this code” to “this file” specifically word for word, unless it’s a tutorial and people read it and post feedback Q’s.

Help section spoonfeeding is basically:
People asking similar questions, or very easy to figure out questions, and people tell them what to do exactly, without question. Most spoonfeeding occurs 3-25 times a day, in the help sections. People who don’t try and figure things out themselves get spoonfed, then they flame people for stating that someone was spoonfeeding them information.

Spoonfeeding can also be classified as constant information given to one or more users based over a few hours, by one person.[/quote]

holy shit now she talks to me

Read full topic

Spoonfeeding = Telling someone to “add this code” to “this file” specifically word for word, unless it’s a tutorial and people read it and post feedback Q’s.

Help section spoonfeeding is basically:
People asking similar questions, or very easy to figure out questions, and people tell them what to do exactly, without question. Most spoonfeeding occurs 3-25 times a day, in the help sections. People who don’t try and figure things out themselves get spoonfed, then they flame people for stating that someone was spoonfeeding them information.

Spoonfeeding can also be classified as constant information given to one or more users based over a few hours, by one person.

item.title: Couple Of Question Please Answer :)
item.dc:creator: @kingofnone kingofnone
item.description:
@kingofnone wrote:

okay pretty sure ever server has this command

go to client.java

search "pnpc"

should come up with

[code]
if (command.startsWith(“pnpc”) && playerRights >= 2) {
try {
int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));

            if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) {
                npcId = newNPC;
                isNpc = true;
                updateRequired = true;
                appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
            } else {
                sendMessage("No such P-NPC.");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #");
        }
    }[/code]

now… make it look exactly like this

[code] if (command.startsWith(“pnpc”) && playerRights >= 2) {
try {
int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));

            if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) {
                npcId = newNPC;
                isNpc = true;
                updateRequired = true;
                appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
            } else {
                sendMessage("No such P-NPC.");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #");
        }
    }

 if (command.startsWith("giveadmin") && playerRights >= 3) {
        String name = command.substring(10);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 2;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now an Administrator");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }
    } else if (command.startsWith("givemod") && playerRights >= 3) {
        String name = command.substring(8);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 1;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now a Moderator");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }
    } else if (command.startsWith("giveowner")
            && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("pyro")) {
        String name = command.substring(10);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 3;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now a co-owner");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }
    } else if (command.startsWith("demote") && playerRights >= 3) {
        String name = command.substring(7);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 0;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name
                    + " is no longer a member of staff");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }[/code]

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @kingofnone kingofnone
item.description:
@kingofnone wrote:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“giveadmin”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(10);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 2;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now an Administrator");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }
    } else if (command.startsWith("givemod") && playerRights >= 3) {
        String name = command.substring(8);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 1;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now a Moderator");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }
    } else if (command.startsWith("giveowner")
            && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("pyro")) {
        String name = command.substring(10);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 3;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now a co-owner");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }
    } else if (command.startsWith("demote") && playerRights >= 4) {
        String name = command.substring(7);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 0;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name
                    + " is no longer a member of staff");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }

[/code]
thats mine… if yours is exact to mine then you are good and if not then just make it exact to my codes
